title: French Vanilla Coffee Syrup

ingredients.name: vanilla bean paste (or seeds from 1/2 vanilla bean)
heavy cream or sweetened condensed milk (optional)

directions: Combine sugar and water in a small saucepan. Stir over medium heat until fully dissolved.
Add vanilla bean paste (or scraped vanilla bean seeds). Let simmer for 5 minutes to infuse.
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract.
If desired, whisk in heavy cream or condensed milk while warm for a rich French vanilla effect.
Let cool, strain if needed, then bottle. Store in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.
notes: French vanilla has a richer, creamier profile than regular vanilla with subtle custard-like notes. The key is using both vanilla bean paste AND vanilla extract. Heavy cream or condensed milk is optional but adds the classic creamy French vanilla character. Great in lattes, cappuccinos, iced coffee, cold brew, and hot chocolate.
